attributes.action: petition the queen not to make the error of creating Tony Blair a knight of the garter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: following the death of sir edmund hillary there is now a vacancy in the order of the garter. it would be a travesty of this most noble order if tony blair was appointed to it. reasons are too many to list!!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
